<general>
<title>
<string language="en">MPM14x5½ M201 VELO4</string>
<string language="x-mt-it">MPM14x5½ M201 VELO4</string>
<string language="x-mt-fr">MPM14x5½ M201 VELO4</string>
<string language="x-mt-de">MPM14x5½ M201 VELO4</string>
<string language="x-mt-es">MPM14x5½ M201 VELO4</string>
<string language="x-mt-pt">MPM14x5½ M201 VELO4</string>
</title>
<description>
<string language="en">A sound recording from Freesound, a collaborative database of
									audio snippets, samples, recordings, bleeps, ... released under Creative Commons
									licenses that allow their reuse and use for scientific research with correctly
									licensed audio to test algorithms. </string>
</description>
<keyword>
<string language="en">velocity</string>
</keyword>
<keyword>
<string language="en">snare</string>
</keyword>
<keyword>
<string language="en">sandyrb</string>

<string language="en">drum</string>
</keyword>
<keyword>
<string language="en">beyer</string>
</keyword>
<keyword>
<string language="en">14x5</string>
</keyword>
<description>
<string language="x-mt-it">Una registrazione del suono da Freesound, una base
di dati di collaborazione degli snippets audio, i campioni, le 
registrazioni, segnali... si è liberata sotto le autorizzazioni 
creative dei terreni comunali che permettono la loro riutilizzazione 
ed usano per ricerca scientifica con audio correttamente autorizzato 
verificare le procedure.</string>
</description>
<description>
<string language="x-mt-fr">Un enregistrement sonore de Freesound, une base de
données de collaboration des extraits sonores, échantillons, 
enregistrements, bips... a libéré sous les permis créateurs de 
terrains communaux qui permettent leur réutilisation et l'utilisent 
pour la recherche scientifique avec l'acoustique correctement 
autorisée pour tester des algorithmes.</string>
</description>
<description>
<string language="x-mt-de">Eine Tonaufnahme von Freesound, eine 
gemeinschaftliche Datenbank von Audiosnippets, Proben, Aufnahmen, 
Pieptöne... gab unter kreative Common-Lizenzen frei, die ihre 
Wiederverwendung erlauben und für wissenschaftliche Forschung mit 
richtig genehmigtem Audio verwenden, Algorithmen zu prüfen.</string>
</description>
<description>
<string language="x-mt-es">Una grabación de Freesound, una base de datos de 
colaboración de sonidos de los snippets audio, muestras, grabaciones,
señales... release/versión bajo las licencias creativas de los 
campos comunes que permiten su reutilización y la utilizan para la 
investigación científica con audio correctamente licenciado probar 
algoritmos.</string>
</description>
<description>
<string language="x-mt-pt">Uma gravação sadia de Freesound, uma base de 
dados collaborative de snippets audio, amostras, gravações, 
bleeps... liberou-se sob as licenças creativas das terras comuns que 
permitem seu reusar e se usam para a pesquisa científica com áudio 
corretamente licenciado testar algoritmos.</string>
</description>
